column4: is there any software to show the total amount of internet usage?
no, but your isp will provide it

ask your isp, iam sure they provide it
isps in india arent so efficient
do you have a web account with your isp
yes but the data is not realtime
yea no real time, its at the end
hmm interesting, send me a link
this must be some local broadband
we have to login to their lan website
iam from mumbai but never heard of it
lol pacenet the worst ever i have seen
they can never match aritel quality
well nivyah is the best we can get
i had that crappy pacenet local , no airtel in bangur nagar
nivyah plans r cheap but they dont have customer care
yea thats why its cheap :) no body cares
but nivyah is hardly  been down
try airtel if you plan games online, quality of line is superb
yeah for normal use any line is ok, but i struggled with pacenet and it was always down
ask the local operator, he will know
nivyah has only been down twice in 2 months of use
pacenet also i logged in from cable operator site
they buy bandwidth from the big players, but their connection outside the country sucks, bad routing and equipment
